title: Earthen
description: Sonya Gou has a major issue. Her guardian keeps her safe from threats against her life and his heart. How can she survive being so close to the one man she cannot have? Zihao Liang. Guardian. Warrior. Earthen. Blood sworn to protect the Gou's treasure, Sonya, he has put his love for her beneath a sacred vow to protect her at all cost. Zihao and Sonya must put their love to the test when a powerful enemy threatens all they hold dear.
author: RaeLynn Blue
